channel.title: Kratos [Unique 474]
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]Welcome to Kratos[/size] Anybody that has experience with GFX could make a banner that'd be cool, and much appreciated.[/center]
[center][b]Website:[/b] [url=http://google.com]not up or approved yet[/url][/center]
[center][b]I want to personally thank Ruby, for funding us with a domain and giving us a spare database to use.[/b][/center]
[center][size=18pt]Development Team:[/size] Scape-JAVA: Server developer/Client Developer [/center]
[center][b]Update log:[/b] [code] [/code] [/center]
[b]Q: Are you going to host this eventually?[/b] [b] A: Yes, but we currently have no way to host it.[/b] [b]Q: How is the server gonna be shared amongst the developers?[/b] [b] A: Probably via github.[/b]
This server will have no weapons or armor above dragon, no magic items, just basic potions, basic clothing, a good economy. Money is not going to be that easy to obtain. We are trying to create a more basic server to perhaps create a simple yet new and exciting experience for players.
The server will consist of two factions:
[b]Natives: Ape Atoll[/b] The Native faction is based on Skilling and grinding but they still have to have players who are willing to protect their home from the invading Ventia colony. This faction will be located on Ape Atoll. They will have more of an uncivilized faction, but still with a sense of government (more on that later). The shops will have tribal items in it.
[b]Pros:[/b]
[ul][li]Natives will have bonuses of being able to make herbal potions, getting minerals to make better skilling items, pick axes, axes, fishing stuff, making poisons etc.[/li] [li]Physically stronger than the Ventia's.[/li][/ul]
[b]Cons:[/b]
[ul][li]The Native faction is really poor. Everything in shops has an extremely expensive value to them, and cash flow is extremely limited. However resources are not.[/li][/ul]
------------------------
[b]The Ventia's: Falador[/b] The Ventiian faction is a lot like the Native faction, except there is more currency in the City of Falador than there is in the Native village. Having miners, woodcutters, farmers, soldiers, etc are all still necessities. You never know when the Native faction will decide to invade.
This is a wealthy faction. The economy is decent, but much like the Native faction items are expensive.
[b]Pros:[/b]
[ul][li]The player will have a lot of money, and O-K armor, but not the best. The armor that comes from the black smith is in the range of 100k/per plateleg and platebody.[/li][/ul]
[b]Cons:[/b]
[ul][li]The English faction may be rich, but there is a lack of herbal potions going around to help cure poisons etc.[/li] [li]Not as physically strong as the natives, which can be a disadvantage in combat.[/li] [li]Less access to resources and minerals.[/li][/ul]
[center][size=18pt]Features[/size][/center]
[ul][li][size=12pt][b]Faction leaders and Elections:[/b][/size][/li][/ul]
Each faction will have custom elections each month to select the leaders for their faction. The winner of each election will be the leader, The Chief for the Natives and The King Or Queen for the Ventia's. These leaders will be the political leader for all diplomatic issues between the factions. As King/Queen or Chief of a faction, you may assign a military field Marshal so you as a King/Queen or Chief do not have to put the higher power at risk of death.
[ul][li][size=12pt][b]Wars:[/b][/size][/li][/ul]
What would a RuneScape Private Server be without killing other players? The two factions, of course, will be able to fight each other, anywhere in the world. Outside of the home areas, everywhere will be a danger zone. The only way you can fight other players in the factions home area is if a faction war is declared upon each others faction. Then, you can pillage the other factions home in an effort to run them out. If you manage to kill the other factions leader, you can run the other faction out of their home, in which case they have to find a new one, and the victorious faction can reap the rewards.
[ul][li][size=12pt][b]The armory, and the time for war:[/b][/size][/li][/ul]
This is a cool idea I've just recently conjured up, also. These armories will only be open to the faction that is being attacked, not the aggressor. They will have to figure a way out to survive and not die during the raid on the town.
Each faction will have a designated armory. These armories will consist of these items(nothing higher than addy): [b]Weapons and armor:[/b] Scimitars, long swords, swords, daggers, helmets, platelegs, platebodies, and shields. Yew bows, arrows, studded chaps, leather body, and a coif of a sort (not sure yet).
[b]Food and potions:[/b] Lobsters, swordfish. Strength potions
[ul][li][size=12pt][b]Night and Day:[/b][/size][/li][/ul]
ExVentia will have a unique system (iirc it's only been done once), which is [b]Night[/b] and [b]Day[/b] time.
During the Day: Things will happen as they regularly do. Factions will build an economy, players will work to have a successful job. Either being, a miner, a wood worker, an infantry soldier or a smith. (All skills will be trainable no matter what your job is though, albeit the higher the level the more you get paid).
During the Night: The server will not have a sleeping option (could possibly happen), but. Players will be able to work, or go to a local pub to have a drink and socialize. However, as you can tell all the other skills are a necessity to have except fire making, so my development team and I have conjured up an idea to make fire making an important survival skill within the server.
As night time comes around, the temperature will dramatically decrease therefore putting your player at risk of hypothermia from the cold. Being in a city, will prevent this system from taking effect on your player. However, in the wilderness or while you're on campaign with your field Marshal having logs and a tinderbox is a necessity otherwise, you or your army will freeze to death at night.
[b]Want to apply?[/b] [b]Name&Age:[/b] [b]Proof of Work[/b] [i](p.s, we don't give a fuck about shitty PI leeches)[/i]: [b]Is there any way we can contact you if necessary (Skype, msn, irc, etc):[/b] [size=20pt][b]Developers will be chosen at our discretion as well. [/b][/size]

item.title: Kratos [Unique 474]
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:42, topic:450204”][quote author=n10si t link=topic=553104.msg4063173#msg4063173 date=1343611734]

I am 15 years old. I own a vps with 12 proccessers, 5500mb ram and 900 mbps. I just learned java in a day. I will be able to program soon. If you are intrested my skype is Hunter_schwartz.

INFINITE PROCESSING ABILITIES
[/quote]

Lol, bitches don’t know 'bout my 12 processors.

900 M.B.P.S = instant panty-dropper.[/quote]
Was that pun intended?

Edit: zlLux is funny; I can’t tell if he’s trolling or not:
“Are you familiar with PI?: I know it’s a web client. I am not familiar but I could be.
Extras: Familiar with the architecture of linux. Half way done learning java. Know iptables rules aka. linux firewall. I have been owner of 3 other servers and ran them. I owned a minecraft server with 25+ players. I have jailbroken a playstation. I have a nor/nand flasher. I am able to downgrade iphones,playstation 3 firmwares, xbox 360 dashboard. I also hacked mw2 and mw3.”

“Experience (Scale 1-10):10 on administrator. Honestly new to coding but I learned java in a day. So about a 7.”

Read full topic

item.title: Kratos [Unique 474]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:17, topic:450204”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=553104.msg4052778#msg4052778 date=1342671664]

I like the ideas of this server. For the wars, do the players go back to their faction after or how is that going to work?

When the player dies during a war lets say, on campaign. They’d get sent back to their faction base. However, if it’s a raid on the town, there will be an armory only available during faction wars in the castle that players can grab designated items from like scimitars, arrows, and basic armor. There will also be a safe zone inside of the castle, but the player will only be able to remain the the safe zone for 45 seconds before they are forcefully moved into the war.

I like these ideas. I’d say it’s unique! Good luck!
[/quote]

Thanks.

We’ve decided how wars are going to be handled:
Each faction has a leader the King/Queen or the Chief. These people will NOT be able to declare war. This will be a completely scheduled global server event and it will be hosted by the faction administrator. (Myself, and n10si_t or The Soul). This will avoid frustration with people who aren’t willing to fight. (This is the global pk event it will happen once or twice a week).[/quote]

Why not write up a system similar to World of Warcraft? The players can que themselves for the event, once enough people are ready, it launches and lets them teleport to the area if allowed. You can tell it to auto-exempt level 3s and what-not. There’s all sorts of possibilities to this.

Read full topic
